                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> cardown,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> cardwanted)
           throws java.sql.SQLException
        allows the user to create an exchange by selecting the cards he would like to give and the cards he would like to receive
        Specified by:
        create in interface ExchangeCardDAO
        Parameters:
        user - the user who creates the exchange
        cardown - id and quantity of the cards the user would like to give
        cardwanted - id and quantity of the cards the user would like to have
        Returns:
        the id that identifies the created exchange
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception caused by database access error

      • getAllExchange

        public java.util.ArrayList<Exchange> getAllExchange​(User user,
                                                    java.lang.String parameter)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Takes, based on the parameters, exchanges created by the user or all the exchanges the logged user can accept
        Specified by:
        getAllExchange in interface ExchangeCardDAO
        Parameters:
        user - the logged user
        parameter - (switch clause) "mine" to get all user's exchanges - "all" to get exchenges he can accept - notify to exchanges not notified,yet
        Returns:
        exchanges created by the logged user or all the exchanges they can accept
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception caused by database access error

      • filtersExchange

        public java.util.ArrayList<Exchange> filtersExchange​(User user,
                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.lang.String category,
                                                     java.lang.String classCard,
                                                     java.lang.String typeCard)
        Allows the logged user to find certain available exchanges,except for the ones started by logged user, through the filters of the search bar.
        Specified by:
        filtersExchange in interface ExchangeCardDAO
        Parameters:
        user - logged user
        name - the name of the card offered that belongs to searched exchange.
        category - the category of the card offered that belong to searched exchange.
        classCard - class of the card offered that belong to searched exchange.
        typeCard - type of the card offered that belong to searched exchange.
        Returns:
        the requested exchanges from logged user.
